dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] [Fwd: [LEVEL2] [SUPPORT] Hosted Web Site]]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Thursday, September 23, 2004 5:22 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] [Fwd: [LEVEL2] [SUPPORT] Hosted Web Site]]

Forwarding to Legal for review.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] [Fwd: [LEVEL2] [SUPPORT] Hosted Web Site]
Date: Thu, 23 Sep 2004 10:40:07 -0500
From: Michael Montgomery <mmontgomery@theplanet.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

-----Forwarded Message-----
> From: Cavin Jacobs <cavin@nationsloanservices.com>
> To: support@theplanet.com
> Subject: [LEVEL2] [SUPPORT] Hosted Web Site
> Date: Thu, 23 Sep 2004 01:11:07 -0700
> 
> Hi,
> I notice you are providing hosting for the website
> www.personal-auto-loans.com. The owner/operator of this website has
> copied text word for word off of my site www.azautoloan.com. The text
> is:
>  
>  
> can help you get into a nice, affordable automobile. Bad credit is not
> a problem! Auto loans are available regardless of previous credit
> problems. Many people can spend up to 10 hours at one car dealership
> trying to get auto loan financing only to be told that their credit
> isn't good enough. We specialize in bad credit auto loans. We can help
> you regardless of bad, little or no credit. Bad credit shouldn't keep
> you from getting an auto loan and owning a nice new or pre-owned
> vehicle! In addition to providing the right auto loan options for you,
> our goal is to provide customers with the opportunity to establish or
> rebuild their auto credit regardless of previous bankruptcies,
> repossessions, or other bad credit issues.
>  
> I have made attempt to notify the owner by the listed contact
> information that they need to remove this content by weeks end.
>  
> This is my living an I take it very seriously. Please advise this
> website owner about the Digital Millineum Act of 1998. Your customer
> has been advised that if the content is not removed by 5 p.m. on
> Friday Sept. 25 that this issue will go to my attorney and I will
> pursue it very agressively.
>  
>  
>  
> Regards,
> Cavin Jacobs
> TMC Financial Services Inc.
> www.tmcfinancialservices.com
> 
> ______________________________________________________________________
> --------------------------- 
> The Planet Technical Support
> 214.752.5581   800.854.7679     
> 1950 Stemmons Freeway,#3048
> Dallas, Texas 75207            
>
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Please do not respond directly to the sender of this message.    Ensure
that
> support@theplanet.com is included on ALL mailings to ensure a fast
response.
>
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
> NOTE:  This message may not have been written by a representative of
>        The Planet's technical support team.  This message footer only
>        specifies that the mail has passed through the support mailing
>        list processor.
>
----------------------------------------------------------------------------



-- 
Thanks,
Garrett White
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
